SELECT sd.id, sd.parent_id, sd.label, sd.sort, sd.create_time, sd.update_time FROM sys_department AS sd
AND sd.label LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.label},'%')
AND sd.parent_id = #{request.parentId}
AND sd.create_time >= DATE_FORMAT(#{request.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(sd.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{request.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY sd.sort ASC
